sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Action) The character may take the Saber Throw action, making a Lightsaber combat check as a ranged attack at one target within medium range, adding force dice (white d12) no greater than his Force rating to the check. The character must spend force points and succeed on the check to hit his target; he may spend force points to have his weapon return to his hand after resolving the attack.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Saber throw</name> <number>TAL0001117</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-23 05:06:55</sys_created_on> <sys_id>ccd9b9cddb6a8c542901de90cf96195b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-23 05:06:55</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
